name: The Quest for the Golden Rule
name_original: The Quest for the Golden Rule
description:
Game is heavily inspired by the Hot and Cold minigame in Final Fantasy IX

Your name is Timmy, your 10 years old and you love videogames. More than anything you would like the new videogame system, the 'X-Station' from Sonysoft. Unfortunately it's $500. It would take forever to save up your allowances, but then you got a bright idea. An old school was just torn down and you heard a teacher there lost a solid gold rule that was kept in a display case. Maybe\nit's still in the ground from when the school was demolished. That should be worth enough money to get your 'X-Station'.");

Controls:
Move: WASD or arrows
Dig / Confirm: Space

How to Play
You have 1 minute to find as much treasure as you can. When you dig, no '!' means your not close a treasure, the more '!', the closer the treasure is.

reach $500 to win the game.
